Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45853 affecting package zlib for versions less than 1.2.13-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45853 affecting package zlib for versions less than 1.2.13-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package zlib is earlier than 1.2.13-2, affected by CVE-2023-45853
